name: Double Interview
title: Double Interview
subtitle: Simultaneous interview with two historical figures

setup.selectDescription: Select two historical figures for a parallel dialogue

description: Compare the responses of two historical figures
greeting2: Hello, I'm {{name}}. I'm ready for your question.

reflection.title: Reflection on the Parallel Interview
reflection.description: Analyze the differences and similarities in the responses of the two characters.

questions.q1: What were the most significant differences in the way the two characters answered your questions?
questions.q2: What similarities did you notice in their responses despite their different backgrounds?
questions.q3: How did the historical and cultural context influence each character's responses?
questions.q4: Which character seemed more convincing or informative? Why?
questions.q5: How could you apply what you learned from this double interview?
